title.value: LXDE - Create a link to folders or files

body.value:
To create a symbolic link:
for 14.04 LTS ff: Open file manager PCMan, click on the folder or file, press at the same time the keys CTL and â‡§ (Shift) and move it by Drag and Drop e.g. to the desktop, important: first unrelease mouse button, then unrelase keys.
for 12.04.LTS or if Drag+Drop does not work: open a terminal and type:
logged in as user labdoo: ln -s -t /home/labdoo/Desktop /home/labdoo/Public/videos (Enter)
logged in as user student: ln -s -t /home/student/Desktop /home/labdoo/Public/videos (Enter)
More information --> http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/PCMan_File_Manager
